subject: How to get the time of execution of individual method in Junit Test Case?
msgSnippet: Hi, When we execute a Junit test case,we get the time of execution of that test.Similarly, I want to know, is there any tool which can help me in finding the
messageBody:
Hi,
When we execute a Junit test case,we get the time of execution of that test.Similarly, I want to know, is there any tool which can help me in finding the time of execution of individual method in Junit Test Case.
Thanks in advance,
Basavaraj
